trans-unit.source: Defines an interface for a collection of <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaItem"></xref> objects, which can be addressed either by name or by index.
trans-unit.target: 定義集合的介面<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaItem"></xref>可依名稱或依索引來定址的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the specified collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之集合中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the integer value for the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中傳回的項目數的整數值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of one of the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaItem"></xref> types, as defined in the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaItemType"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的執行個體，其中的<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaItem"></xref>類型中所定義<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaItemType"></xref>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The name to associate with the new item.
trans-unit.target: 使用新的項目相關聯的名稱。

trans-unit.source: In cases where the item is a reference item type, the name parameter must be exactly the same as the name of the referenced assembly, as set with the <xref:Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaReferenceItem.AssemblyName*> property.
trans-unit.target: 在項目所在的參考項目類型的情況下，名稱參數必須剛好是參考的組件，為資料集的名稱相同<xref:Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaReferenceItem.AssemblyName*>屬性。</xref:Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaReferenceItem.AssemblyName*>

trans-unit.source: In JScript, however, if you do not specify an AssemblyName, JScript will use the ItemName as the name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 在 JScript 中，不過，如果您未指定 AssemblyName，JScript 會使用 ItemName 做為組件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The type of item created, as defined in the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaItemType"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 建立，如中所定義的項目類型<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaItemType"></xref>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The optional flag to specify the initial content of a Code item.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性旗標指定的程式碼項目之初始內容。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaItem"></xref> object created.
trans-unit.target: 將參考傳回給<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaItem"></xref>所建立的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an item from the collection by its index value.
trans-unit.target: 從集合取得項目，依索引值。

trans-unit.source: A 0-based index of the retrievable items.
trans-unit.target: 擷取項目的以 0 起始索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定索引處的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets an item from the collection by its name.
trans-unit.target: 依名稱從集合取得項目。

trans-unit.source: The name of the item to retrieve from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要從集合中擷取之項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the item specified by name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回依名稱指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: Removes an item from the collection, as specified by its index value.
trans-unit.target: 移除集合中，其索引值所指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The index value of the item to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之項目的索引值。

trans-unit.source: Removes an item from the collection, as specified by its name.
trans-unit.target: 移除集合中，其名稱所指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The name of the item to be removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要從集合中移除之項目的名稱。
